website_summaries.verdict: Incorporates anti-mold technology, so perfect for those who hate to clean humidifiers.
pros: Vertical design doesn’t take up much space
Movable spout helps direct vapor where you want it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought a smaller unit from this company and it didn't fit the purpose I needed it. I contacted company on a Sunday and they responded immediately and resolved the situation and recommended this unit for my families needs. This unit is fantastic and works great and is super quiet. The large tank holds days worth of water and night light built in is a plus. I highly recommend this company as they not only sell great quality, but they have fantastic service and stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Staples

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months and then cracked and soaked my nightstand/floors. See Photo.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 months and then cracked and soaked my nightstand/floors. See Photo. I used this humidifier nearly every night. I gently washed it, per instructions, about every ten days. The unit never fell to the ground and was never harshly treated. I filled the tank before work, inserted it into the bottom unit, ensured it was properly sealed, and then left the house. Upon return, all of the water had leaked out and damaged my nightstand and my wood floors. Think about whether you want the same thing to happen to you - - and then buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Reliability, now junk
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great, excellent reservoir, nice light, good mist produced. However after 2 weeks of semi-daily use (not 24/7, just press the on button once every day or two) the unit has failed. Cracks have developed along the base of the unit in the water reservoir section of the base that covers the ultrasonic transducer. I attempted an exchange with Amazon, only to be informed that there are no returns or exchanges with this item. Great unit when it works, but only worked for a couple weeks then catastrophic failure. You want 2L of water all over your floor and belongings?
customer_reviews.author: 2K1Toaster

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after first use and leaks....
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and it was fine-made no noise! The second time I went to use it, I filled it up and it wouldn't start. After unplugging and plugging it back in to different outlets I gave up. Then I lifted it up to find water leaking out of the bottom. I went to return it and it said it wasn't returnable, ugh! I contacted Amazon and they credited me for the purchase. I should have listened to the negative reviews of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkyj

customer_reviews.title: Really like this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Really like this humidifier. Used it in my home for a couple months before taking it on a work trip to a hotel in Las Vegas. The various settings are really easy to use. The light is quite bright, so might not be great in a bedroom at night, unless you cover the on/off button. Using the little brush to clean out the insides is important to keeping high intensity flow. I just use tap water and in Seattle it required cleaning every couple days but in Las Vegas is got gunky with a day.
customer_reviews.author: D....

customer_reviews.title: Completely quiet, works great in a small area, perfect for winter in dry climates
customer_reviews.text: While recovering from LASEK surgery over the past few months, I bought two of these humidifiers and used one at work during the day and another in my bedroom at night. Works instantly and completely silently. KIND of easy to clean but still a pain to get the scale off. I wish you could turn the power light off in addition to the "night light" which is like having a 100 watt bulb on. Even the power button itself is SUPER bright and can't be turned off while it's in operation. I wound up taping paper over it so it didn't make the bedroom so bright. A great bargain for the $, light, portable, easy to fill. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird-NOLA

customer_reviews.title: Lodging port cracked in less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased when we started using it. My newborn is sleeping in our bedroom and after using this he stopped getting so many boogers! On the fourth night of use I noticed the water seal knob was cracked. I figured it was from my husband screwing it on to tight. It was still useable. The next night the port was cracked and the knob just about disintegrated in my hand. We didn't even use it for a week! The plastic that holds the water in is incredibly cheap.. and may even be water soluble! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in 9 months
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked for a while -- probably about a dozen uses from January 2018 until August 2018. Just took it out to use this week (September 2018) and the unit will does not operate. The light on the front of the unit stays red consistently, only periodically turning on to release some mist and then shutting off again. Tried emptying the unit and refilling it but that did not produce any better results. I am going to reach out to the manufacturer to see if the stated 1-yr warranty (per Amazon listing) is able to offer any remedy.
customer_reviews.author: JSK

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...for a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: It worked just as I had hoped for the first few weeks. I'd fill it up before going to bed and set it on low and it would run all night. Then I started waking up to a flooded nightstand and loud bubbling noises. It seems when it started to get low on water it would just leak and bubble instead. I guess that's what I get for going inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan B

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this humidifier. The biggest plus was the "Silver Clean Protection fights the growth of mold and mildew on the surface of the water tank". I will admit I don't always clean our humidifier on a regular basis. I do my daughter as I run hers more than I do mine but it is still a huge bonus knowing it has this feature. The tank and base is really easy to clean. No hidden area you have to try and break your hand to try and clean. I really like this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: +After leaving a small amount of water on the unit for at least 2 weeks, I was surprised to find ZERO mold inside the blue water container when I went to clean it! - The unit has a small LED bubble that makes the water container difficult to mate to the base. Frustrating design feature. The container is too small to run on high all night, but on low/med lasts at least until morning. Good overall.
customer_reviews.author: The Tommasinis

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean, usually last two full nights (turned off during the day) with one refill. I have been using only RO water in it and it really does cut down on any deposits or extra grime. I try to clean it once a week, but it usually ends up being longer. The base actually needs cleaning more than the refill part of the unit. Does not beep when it runs out of water! (this is huge, because so many other ones do). I am using it in our room for now, but I think it will work for baby's room too when she arrives... if I can part with it : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults and kids alike!
customer_reviews.text: I just got two of these humidifiers and love them already! We originally purchased two of the Crane brand humidifiers (animal version), but after a year they have started making horrendous noises. I pitched them because they were past warrantee. As these currently run in two different bedrooms, I can't even tell they're on! They're so quiet. My son's love the nightlight feature as well. I like the fact that there are three different speeds as well. Unless these things start acting crazy, they're keeping this 5-star rating!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent humidifier. It really is for PERSONAL use. For me and my husband to breath better in bed we both need one on the night table. It has three levels, but I only use the lowest level. The higher levels causes too much condensation and leaves water on my table. All that being said, I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: ABCedar

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: The first couple weeks seemed to be great, I cleaned every week. Humidifier worked very nice. For a couple months now I’ve noticed that I have to clean it every other day. It gets slimy and looks very gross. And there’s a wired smell that comes out when I turn it on? It’s bad. So for that reason I can no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not prevent mold as claimed
customer_reviews.text: This product works well as a humidifier. I use it in my kids’ room daily. However the claims that it has some special coating to prevent mold growth are completely untrue. I have to clean it multiple times a week due to the growth of pink mold (or mildew, not sure the difference) that occurs all inside of the base and the spout that distributes the mist from the top. Also, the mist lasts for about 12 hours on the lowest setting but less than 8 hrs on the highest output setting. So we are refilling it with clean water every day. I’m really disappointed as I bought it specifically because of the anti mold claims.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Particularly like the auto turn off feature
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 92 year old Mom. Works well as not too big. She can fill it herself. Does require filtered water or white specs on all surfaces. Particularly like the auto turn off feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Tee

customer_reviews.title: Best we've found
customer_reviews.text: Puts out nice mist. The PureGuardian 4L Output per Day Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier, Baby Room, Nursery Humidifier, Portable Humidifier, Travel Humidifier, Small Humidifier, Desk Humidifier, Pure Guardian H940 is quiet enough and although the light i too bright for a child's night light, it can easily be turned on or off. Easy to fill, and clean, plus i like the form factor, which makes it more difficult to accidentally tip. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Put it in the room with the new baby to help with his allergies and a cold that kept coming back. Ever since we started to use this, he’s been better and slept better. Super quiet. Night light comes in handy in the middle of the night. Love that it turns off when the water gets low. Super easy to use. We will probably buy another one for our room.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna White

customer_reviews.title: Genie in a Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these to give to the same family at Xmas time. Even though not a traditional shape for a humidifier, it had all the perks I was looking for, like a larger capacity reservoir, mold-resistant coating inside, adjustable air flow and a night light. Very good price as well, I might add! Additionally, I have spoken with the users since the gifting and they are very pleased with humidifiers & their operation.
customer_reviews.author: Kaybee

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased this humidifier based on the reviews and so far I love it. It has made such a difference. I was waking in the morning with puffy eyes and a dry nose and this has taken care of both problems. It is whisper quiet and the filled tank last almost all day. The only thing that bothers me is that it says best to use distilled water. I don't mind using distilled water but it's an added expense and inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: empi

customer_reviews.title: Must clean too frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but have to clean often! Love the humidifier vey quiet but you must use distilled water otherwise you’ll have mold. Since distilled water is expensive we choose to use bleach to clean the humidifier instead. Good product for the price but don’t like how often we have to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: cindy halperin

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS ON CRACKING
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I've owned within the past year. First one cracked and I thought, no problem. I probably dropped it. Second one cracked and I was suspicious, so they sent me a third one for free (very nice customer service just a bad product). Third one broke after ONE NIGHT and got water all over my desk. POOR QUALITY! And it breaks so easily! While it works it is very nice but it does not last at all and breaks so so so very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our master bedroom.  A must own :)
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item. It has 3 setting, works for a large master bedroom, is quiet and easy to use, and looks great. I mostly love that it doesn't need a filter. My only complaint is that it cannot be filled at bathroom sink because of its long neck I have to use the tub or go down to the kitchen and both mean another step before bed. Otherwise I think its perfect and a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Grace

customer_reviews.title: best for homes without toddlers
customer_reviews.text: If you have toddlers this one isn't for you unless you've got someplace up high/out of reach to sit it. We typically sit ours on the floor next to our beds so that the humid air can blow upwards and the nightlight is easy to access. the problem we found is that but this one holds water in its base when the top is removed, and the top can be easily taken off or knocked off - these two qualities mean spilled water if it is bumped or knocked over accidentally .
customer_reviews.author: dbt

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE CHEAP MATERIAL THAT WILL BREAK
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is absolutely horrible. We ordered two smaller humidifiers from this company and they worked great for two years until they slowly stopped working due to overuse. We bought two of the .5gallon humidifiers. We opened one of the humidifiers and it worked perfectly...for one day. I went to refill it and the knob completely broke in my hand when I unturned it. Thankfully, Amazon sent me a new one. Well, it worked great for two days...until this evening when I turned the knob and it completely fell apart in my hand! This is absolutely ridiculous. It is obviously made with the CHEAPEST material possible. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Using distilled water means zero cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I know it is expensive to use distilled water all the time but it truly keeps the humidifier clean. Also, for those who find it hard to fill from a bathroom faucet because of the tall design, a bottle makes it super easy to fill. This is a great humidifier, super quiet, 3 levels of humidity, one button controls low, medium, high humidity....night light if you want, but I find that the power button itself gives off enough light on its own. I plan to purchase a second humidifier for use during the day in our sun room where I have many plants.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: You might see mixed reviews about white powder around the ...
customer_reviews.text: You might see mixed reviews about white powder around the vaporizer area. This is really dependent on the water being used in the area you live in. For me, I do not notice any white powder and it emits enough vapor for its size. Make sure to clean the white disc with the included brush.
customer_reviews.author: crispybacon

customer_reviews.title: Silent Night
customer_reviews.text: I love how quiet this humidifer is. I got 2 sizes of the same brand and model, and they’re both great. The design/shape does need some getting used to, because even if you fill the water up to the brim, once you flip it upside down, the skinny top part makes it seem like it’s not filled all the way up. That being said, this humidifier stays working the whole night for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: T. G.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a few time and it already isn't working. I came into my baby's nursery one night only to find the hardwood floors SOAKED. I thought it was user error, so I cleaned it out, double checked everything, and tried again the next day and saw the mist was only shooting out the top about an inch and then going straight to the ground. It was like it was too heavy to go up in the air. The light on it is also really bright and wakes my baby up, so I had to always cover it with something before we turned the lights off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier I've used
customer_reviews.text: Best humidifier I've used! It will go for over a day before I have to refill the tank which is awesome. And it even comes with a little cleaning brush attached to the inside of the base that makes cleaning the build-up a breeze. This tanks stays clean with some simple rinsing every so often! Unlike most other humidifiers I've used before get very dirty and smelly after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: evan2293

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! The air in my bedroom is noticibly better than in the rest of the house. We heat with a wood stove, so the air can get pretty arid during the colder months. My friend that stopped by even remarked how the air felt better in that room. The nightlight is nice too- very pretty blue, but also a very soft light, not too bright to distract sleep.
customer_reviews.author: B_Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Worth the money at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice humidifier. Bought for my elderly mom who lives in an assisted living facility. She was staying hoarse and dried sinuses and it has made a world of difference in her breathing and moisturizing the dry heat
customer_reviews.author: kayk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little humidifier! I bought this one because it has a smaller tub. My in laws are both older and they are not able to bend over a tub to fill up the ones like I have. I searched for a top fill without much luck so then I searched for a smaller one that they could fill at the kitchen sink and it would not be too heavy to carry. This one is PERFECT for them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great and doing the job and quieter then other brand.
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is easy to clean but I just don’t think it last 30hr like it states but it does have the automatic shut off. The only downfall is the light on the front Does not turn off so this isn’t ideal for a nursery but I put something in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Had this 3 days and water leaked out of on off button and electric unit inside burned up and burned the cloth on my night stand. Extremely unsafe. My house could have burned down had my husband not caught it.
customer_reviews.author: Harleydiva101

customer_reviews.title: Good unit and I do recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Good unit and I do recommend it. Good for a kids size bedroom. The cons are that the tank is too long to fit in the bathroom sink for a fill-up, the on/off button has to be pushed a few times (like three times) in order to turn it on or off. We have to fill it up in the tub. But it does come with a little brush to clean all the nooks. Brush is really cheap, but it helps. A pro is the the top is flat, so you can let it rest it in the kitchen sink while filling it up.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: This particular model looks cool and was the ideal size for a small room
customer_reviews.text: I own another model of PureGuardian humidifier, and will say that they are high in quality. This particular model looks cool and was the ideal size for a small room. But it is such a pain to fill with water, I returned it. It will not fit in the sink, and I have no desire to lean over the bathtub every day to fill it. Will definitely buy another PureGuardian -- but a different model that will be easier to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my daughter's bedroom. Used every night for 7+ days and has made her sinus issues significant better in the mornings. Large enough to run all night but small enough that she (tween) is able to empty and refill it indepently.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONADDICTEDMOMMY

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Been having it for almost a month and it works super well!! i even bought a second one....cleaning the mineral residue is easy and can be done with the included brush. Blue light is super relaxing and my wife doesn't complain anymore of a sore throat in the morning!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Broken at 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 2 years ago and it just stopped working. It is not a bad deal for the price but I re-ordered a different brand. Even though it's ultrasonic, it should still be cleaned every day, mold still grows. Mold also grows inside the tank's center tube where the mist comes out and it is difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MHA

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier yet!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this humidifier. I've owned quite a few, and this one is quiet enough to run all night, delivers just the right amount of vapor, and is easy to fill from the bathroom sink (no bending over the tub to fill it). I sleep with it on every night and have even brought it along on trips -- it travels easily (if you have space to pack it).
customer_reviews.author: Francesa

customer_reviews.title: so good! I just received it yesterday and set it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I just received it yesterday and set it up last night in my den (to give my plants humidity when I bring them in for the Winter). It is very quiet and you can just barely see the mist shooting out the top. I am running it on low & plan to keep it that way. I hope it benefits both my plants & me!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: A mess ....
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked from the get go. It leaks water out of the bottom of the unit. At first I thought it was just condensation, but it leaked the entire contents out overnight when turned off. It also leaks as it dispenses mist. And yes, I have tried several times to make sure I am not attaching the parts incorrectly. It's going back - and it can't happen fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Form and function

customer_reviews.title: Unit Lasted two weeks😡
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever from amazon. Unit lasted two weeks and began to crack on the inside of the unit. Became very hot and possible fire hazard! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love the fresh air smell and the night light
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier saved me when I was getting really dry from forced air at work. I put it in my office and used it on high. I love the fresh air smell and the night light. It's design is also nice, although people would joke I had a lava lamp at work! I guess it's a good conversation piece too ;)
customer_reviews.author: Searoses

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our Holistic lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: The mist is very "fine". The night light is a real plus. It is super easy to fill. After about 4 months of CONSTANT use, it works perfectly. It has an attractive, clean line, contemporary look, and three family members noticed it at our home, liked what they saw and have purchased one for themselves. We add essential oils to ours for an added bonus of health!!
customer_reviews.author: 463-STANG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Very easy to use, and extremely silent with the exception of a couple gurgles to fill the bottom, every now and then. Even those sounds are very low. It has 3 settings and the blue glow is great as a nightlight. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: SMH
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the initial caption does not match the description. Little deceiving. It says 6 liter output initially. Then in the description deeper on the page, it says 4 liter output. I don't see how this would ever make it to 30 hours even on low. Ok high it makes it to about 9 hours.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: this is quiet and has a good mist output even on the low setting
customer_reviews.text: this is quiet and has a good mist output even on the low setting. the night light is a nice option. it's pretty bright but not too bad. easy to fill and rinse out. so far so good with daily use for about a month-ish. works well for a normal sized bedroom. lasts all night.
customer_reviews.author: NellieR

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier could be better
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it held more water have to fill it every night which is annoying and the water doesn’t mist upwards and comes out and goes down weird not sure it does much
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Surinaga

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Keep looking for other products!
customer_reviews.text: Product not working only had less than 90 days!! (Will not power on!) Of course passed time I could return! I called number recommended by Amazon and a man I could barely understand acted confused & hung up on me!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier is AWESOME! Haven't gotten the first black mold or anything ...
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is AWESOME! Haven't gotten the first black mold or anything inside any parts of this machine! Love how you can change mist settings also! We used it all winter since we have gas fireplace and all of our house hold suffer from Eczema! Really helped to keep the air damp!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Belgard

customer_reviews.title: Compact quiet humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to fill Quiet The light is great Cons: It’s so hard to clean in the tiny cracks Every time I drain it there is a white buildup The water only lasts about 12 hrs
customer_reviews.author: K&J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great little humidifier for a bedroom with three speeds of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little humidifier for a bedroom with three speeds of air flow. The only down side is that you are restricted to using the lowest speed overnight so that you don't run out of water. Easy to fill. Quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: bought this during the crazy fires in california, i ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this during the crazy fires in california, i was suffering major sinus problems from all the smoke. i've been using this unit for more than a month now and have not had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Good pressure but very hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace another humidifier. Extremely hard to clean in one particular area inside the water tank. Even got pipe cleaners hoping to reach the moldy part but didn’t work. Disappointed because everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: KZ NYC

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Mold grows in the bottom part where the water is even when running the humidifier (black spots). We have tried cleaning it thoroughly every one to two days and it doesn't help. We have another humidifier that is a different brand and we have never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to fill, it runs out before it should, and it noisy as the water keeps dropping down into the ultrasonic area.
customer_reviews.author: nancy petrella

customer_reviews.title: Nice humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Attractive style, efficient, easy, finally got me to break down and buy distilled water. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ndlogan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It's simple enough and easy to use but poorly made. I should have listened to the reviews that spoke about cracking because that's exactly what happened. We used it for two nights and then it would work when we lifted it, we realize the closing screw piece had actually cracked. They also DO NOT allow returns, I tried. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use and carry with arthritic hands. Eliminates static electricity in house and with cats. Find that I sleep better too!
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier, it is awesome for a small place, absolutely quiet. Very good quality for the money you pay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only downside to this humidifier is it fills from ...
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to this humidifier is it fills from the bottom which is really inconvenient. Other than that, it is completely quiet and will run all night on medium without running out of water.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered several of these humidifiers over the years. Each one does a great job of humidifying a single room in our house. They are extremely quiet. After a few years, they often begin to make a slight humming noise. When that happens, we get a replacement. We've found they are easy to clean. I plan to keep using these humidifiers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marco C.

customer_reviews.title: Just Ehh.
customer_reviews.text: Its OK as a humidifier but I would not buy again. Puts out some moisture into the air but not much. And, it's a pain to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lina

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I use this most of the year and I absolutely love it! It’s large enough to last all night but sleek. Works in my entire bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the bigger one. Use this one in my room and bigger unit in open concept front room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this- it’s easy to use.. easy to clean- you can use the night light or turn it off- works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: KELLY LAMURE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, no chemical odors found with others treated with anti microbial agents. Runs quiet . Good value
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This little unit fits our needs. We run it on low and fill it Morning and Night with filtered water. We also put one Aquastick GGH15 in the water tank and that has kept the tank clean. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We just had this a few days. But, works well. I can not hear it at night. The blue light is nice to see at night. Or you can turn it off. Hold water well. Like the design. I actually have it on the floor, works well for us. It's a nice steam setting. Good product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Castles

customer_reviews.title: Mold and bright lights
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product a lot. It's almost silent, but less than a month of using it, there is mold growing inside the tank. There is also a bright green or red light for the power button that is very annoying during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - easy to use, lots of vapor...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Easy to use, lots of vapor, not too loud... Good price. Does not hold as much water as other models we've had, but has lasted the night when not turned to max flow.
customer_reviews.author: Living The Dream

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Perfect for bedroom...lasts all night.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Best nights sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is amazing. The furnace dries my airway out and causes me to sleep horribly. This thing has 3 settings( I use medium and it lasts 36hrs)plus a nightlight that has an on/off switch. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sacha in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Maybe leave it in pieces when not using?
customer_reviews.text: I left for a week and it was empty and dry but when I turned it on, it smelled like an old wet rag. Still cant get the smell out and I've cleaned every time.
customer_reviews.author: SuAmigo

customer_reviews.title: good unit...
customer_reviews.text: orks as advertised. Can't beat the price/value aspect.... I bought the larger model too. I like this one better. Works the same, like looks of this one better.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it adds humidity to the air as a cool fine mist. I have it beside my bed on an upside down small matching plastic trash can and it is working fine. It does not wet the carpet even though it is only about 1 foot off of the floor. I clean the metal part w a damp paper towel every few weeks and that is all there is to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning brush is missing from the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning brush is missing from the packaging. Seems to be working on its first day, but the maintenance brush is nowhere to be found in the factory package.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: too weak and not very quiet
customer_reviews.text: It is noisy and generates very little moist. I left it on for 8 hours to get the moisture from 10 to 20 in a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in July. Great to use, easy, and lasted 8 hours. However, after almost 2 months of use, it broke for no reason. It will not turn on. I clean it regularly so there is no build up, even took out the bottom to check but nothing showed anything damages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Water keeps getting on the bottom and it makes me nervous to use it. Especially since it's for my newborns room.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McCord

customer_reviews.title: Does not run 30 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet as promised but completely inaccurate when it says it can run for 30 hours on the lowest setting. Set this up in my children's bedroom, turned it on at 8 pm and turned it off around 7 am. There was hardly any water left in it and it certainly would not run for another night, let alone 19 more hours. It is a nice shape, compact size, and very quiet. But I need something that does not have to be refilled every day.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the difference in just one day
customer_reviews.text: Good humidifier for medium-sized bedroom. Works very well and maintenance is easy.
customer_reviews.author: BMC

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd have found many years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with dry air. With heater on during winter I have problems with dry sinuses and dry skin. Great product and very pretty what it is.
customer_reviews.author: lmwlpw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, works great!
customer_reviews.text: We ended up buying a second one we liked the first one so much. They are slim so they don't take up so much room on the dresser, they are quiet, EASY to clean! Love the different output settings too.
customer_reviews.author: BWS

customer_reviews.title: Great Hudidifer
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I really like the fact that you can turn the light on or off. We use it in our bedroom at night. Most other units if it is on the light is On. You can turn the light off to sleep. I will probably be ordering another in the next couple of weeks. This unit will run over 24 hours before needing to be refilled.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is great. I like the three different settings low, medium and high. I can definitely tell a difference. The night light is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Gale S

customer_reviews.title: Powerful mist
customer_reviews.text: So easy, no filters. 3 settings make it easy to control mist. My kids love the night light.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Humidifies as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier is quiet and emits a mist that works for our baby granddaughter. Our house is dry in spite of using a whole house humidifier and the PureGuardian humidifier is just what we needed in the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEHAWK

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged well! Bought my daughter the smaller one and she loved it so much I purchased this bigger one for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It makes a noise like it’s dragging down water to the base every 15 mins or so which is quite loud. I just can’t sleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hillier

customer_reviews.title: 4 months and dead fan!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 4 months, then the fan stopped working. Mist works, but could never escape. Tried replacing the fan, but 2 new fans would never spin. Likely power connection to fan went bad. Won’t buy this again, and not recommending!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sananikone

customer_reviews.title: a nice hum at night too
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and pumps out a lot of water, a nice hum at night too. Having the ability to change the amount of water pumped out and turning the light on or off is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: KellyM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is the perfect size and shape!! It’s extremely easy to fill and I can’t even hear it when it’s on!! I would highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: First if all it looks cool when it is coming out and it is cool, which freaks your mind out because the water vapor is cold not hot which makes it very safe. Very easy to use, and it last a very long time haven't even had to refill it yet, and I've been using it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Western kramer

customer_reviews.title: awful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had to clean a humidifier daily, but if I don't it turns pink with bacteria. Puchased for baby's room, and it's awful. It comes with a tiny brush to clean it but it can not reach everywhere.. highly dissatisfied with those humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Night light is very nice. Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to read the instructions, hubby tried to fill water the wrong way! It's quiet and soothing. Night light is very nice. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We used the humidifier for a couple weeks and then the fan stopped working. We have another humidifier this same brand and it has worked great for a few years, so I was surprised when the new humidifier stopped working. We contacted amazon and they replaced the humidifier quickly! Our new humidifier works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G. Hanks

product_meta.title: Guardian Technologies Pure Guardian H940 Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier, 30 Hrs. Run Time, 0.5 Gal. Tank Capacity, 350 Sq. Ft. Coverage, Small Rooms, Quiet, Filter Free, Treated Tank Resists Mold
product_meta.description: The PureGuardian H940 30-hour Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier guards against problems caused by dry air in the home. It features an easy to fill .5 gallon tank, ideal for use in small sized rooms. Cleanliness matters! Unlike other humidifiers that grow slimy mold on the water tank surface, Silver Clean Protection is embedded in the tank to fight the growth of mold and mildew on the surface of the water tank. Thanks to ultrasonic technology, it disperses a soothing, cool mist into the air and is ultra-quiet, making it ideal to have on while you sleep. A low water indicator light lets you know when it’s time to refill the water tank and the night light feature makes it a great addition to kids’ rooms. PureGuardian humidifiers create a better home environment for those suffering from colds, allergies and dry skin. Note: Run time is based off of running the unit on low speed, also depends on atmospheric conditions. It is important to only use GENUINE Guardian Technologies replacement parts to maintain product performance.
feature_bullets: COOL MIST HUMIDIFIER: The PureGuardian H940 Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier guards against problems caused by dry air in the home and is perfect for those suffering form colds, allergies and dry skin and provides 350 sq. ft. coverage

ULTRASONIC TECHNOLOGY: The H940 disperses a soothing, cool mist into the air and is ultra-quiet, making it ideal to have on while you sleep. Silver Clean protection fights the growth of mold and mildew on the surface of the water tank
GREAT FOR SMALL ROOMS: The .5 gallon tank provides up to 30 hours of run time and is perfect for small sized rooms. The slender desktop design features an optional night light, great for kids rooms

ADDITIONAL FEATURES: A low water indicator light lets you know when it's time to refill the water tank. The H940 cool mist humidifier also features a directional mist nozzle, auto shut-off when empty. No filter cleaning or replacing

PureGuardian: by Guardian Technologies offers a full range of small appliance-based solutions for happier and healthier lives at home, focused on creating powerful, safe and innovative technologies to help facilitate healthier, happier home environments

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
